Translations.Text: O vi kred when Congregational Prayer (Salat Al-Jumu ah) anonc sur Vendred, vi hasten commemoration DI gut all negoc! This est put vi se vi nur kon
Once prayer komplet vi stern land streb di bounties ad memor DI frequently ke vi sukces
When kelk da them ven negoc deal kelk entertainment ili rush gxi las vi star! Dir Ki DI posed est far put than entertainment negoc DI EST PUT Provider
